title._content: "El Cerritto," Edward Larned Ryerson Jr. house, Hot Springs Road, Santa Barbara, California. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["El Cerritto," Edward Larned Ryerson Jr. house, Hot Springs Road, Santa Barbara, California. Valerian along pathway] [1917 spring] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House architecture: Joseph L. Curletti, begun 1913. Landscape: Otto Niedermuller. Associated Name: Nora Butler [Mrs. Edward L.] Ryerson, Jr. Today: House extant with extensive changes. Slide used with lecture "California Gardens" as no. 70. On slide: Red line mark. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2012. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16048 Call Number: LC-J717-X97- 49
